downloadTitle: Test Lab Guide: Configure a Highly Available SharePoint Server 2013 Search Topology
downloadDescription: This paper contains a brief introduction to SharePoint Server 2013 and step-by-step instructions to create a test lab that demonstrates how to configure a search topology that provides high availability.
detailsSection: This paper contains instructions to scale out the SharePoint Server 2013 farm to several servers to create a highly available search topology. The resulting test lab illustrates the search topology for a small all-purpose farm that you can view in the Enterprise Search Architectures for SharePoint Server 2013 technical diagram (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=258647).
systemRequirementsSection: Microsoft Word 2010, Microsoft Word 2013, Portable Document File reader
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button, select the documents to download, and then click Next to save the documents.
  2. Click Save or Save this program to disk.
  3. Find the file on your hard disk and double-click it to open it.
